name: take-last
description: Returns a new shallow copy of the last n elements taken from the end of the given array. When list.length < n the list returned contain list.length elements.
author: Wil Moore III <wil.moore@wilmoore.com>

scripts.release-major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run dependency-check && npm run standard --silent && node test.js | tap-spec
